resources.string: Tour Guide
Places
Restaurants
Hotels
Shopping
Red Fort
The Red Fort is a historic fort in the city of Delhi in India that served as the main residence of the Mughal Emperors.
Netaji Subhash Marg, Lal Qila, Chandni Chowk, New Delhi, Delhi 110006
Humayun\'s Tomb
Humayun\'s tomb is the tomb of the Mughal Emperor Humayun in Delhi, India. The tomb was commissioned by Humayun\'s first wife and chief consort, Empress Bega Begum, in 1569–70.
Mathura Road Opposite, Hazrat Nizamuddin Aulia Dargah, Nizamuddin, New Delhi, Delhi 110013
India Gate
The India Gate is a war memorial located astride the Rajpath, on the eastern edge of the "ceremonial axis" of New Delhi, formerly called Kingsway.
Rajpath, India Gate, New Delhi, Delhi 110001
Jama Masjid

The Masjid e Jahan Numa, commonly known as the Jama Masjid of Delhi, is one of the largest mosques in India. It was built by the Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan between 1650 and 1656 at a cost of one million rupees.
Jama Masjid Rd, Jama Masjid, Chandni Chowk, New Delhi, Delhi 110006
Lotus Temple
The Lotus Temple, located in Delhi, India, is a Baha House of Worship that was dedicated in December 1986. Notable for its flowerlike shape, it has become a prominent attraction in the city.
Lotus Temple Rd, Bahapur, Shambhu Dayal Bagh, Kalkaji, New Delhi, Delhi 110019
Roseate House
Roseate House New Delhi is a contemporary narrative creating a new age revolution in the hospitality space offering 216 spacious plush rooms with 15 suites.
Asset 10 GMR Hospitality District, Near IGI Airport, Aerocity, New Delhi 110002 India
The Leela Palace
The Leela Palace New Delhi at Chanakyapuri is located in the exclusive Diplomatic Enclave and has room sizes starting from 520 Sq ft.
Diplomatic Enclave Chanakyapuri, New Delhi 110002 India
The Lodhi

An urban oasis centrally located in New Delhi, The Lodhi is spread across nearly seven acres on Lodi Road near the Lodi Gardens, an extensive parkland with historic tombs dating back to the 15th century.
Lodhi Road, New Delhi 110003 India
Taj Palace
Nestled amidst the heart of the historic Indian capital city, the iconic Taj Palace, New Delhi has held a distinguished position amongst the finest hotels of the world for close to four decades.
2 Taj Palace, New Delhi Sardar Patel Marg Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi 110021 India
Radisson Blu

Conveniently located within 15 minutes drive from Indira Gandhi airport, few minutes’ walk from Dwarka sector 13 Metro station. The hotel accommodates 234 rooms that are equipped with modern amenities and free WIFI.
Plot 4, Dwarka City Centre, Sector 13 next to Metro Station, near IGI Airport, New Delhi 110075 India
Jamun

Nothing can beat the surreal ambiance and interior of Jamun, you\'ll be pleased by their commitment to the food they cater too. In a sea of new places, Jamun has definitely stood out with its original concept and exquisite meals.
17, Lodhi Colony, Lodhi Colony, New Delhi
Beeryani
Mamagoto, a famed restaurant for its unique Pan-Asian, this place is good for those who love trying out the exclusive flavor of Asian Cuisines.
Shop 2, Main Market, Opposite IIT Main Gate, SDA, New Delhi
Indian Accent
One of the most pleasing and best restaurants in Delhi - Indian Accent is built entirely of glass. They have an elegant interior with a classic ambiance and rich seating arrangement.
The Lodhi, Lodhi Road, New Delhi
Pind Balluchi

Known across the country for their authentic North Indian preparations, Pind Balluchi - one of the best North Indian restaurants in Delhi have a strong presence as a brand that does not compromise on quality or either taste.
1/3, Scindia House, Janpath, New Delhi
Diggin

Since its inception opposite Gargi college, Diggin\' created a wave in the capital with its dreamy ambiance. This hidden gem in Santushti complex radiates of a fairytale vibe with its lush green gardens.
Shopping Centre, Opposite Gargi College, Anand Lok, New Delhi
Select City

Fan of all things plush? Well, then you must visit the Select City Walk, a vibrant, upscale and the biggest shopping mall in the heart of South Delhi. The chic shopping center is not just another mall where people come only to shop.
Saket District center, South Delhi
DLF Promenade
DLF is one of the companies that redefined shopping in the country. Besides Delhi, the company also boasts a portfolio of several luxury shopping malls in Noida, Gurgaon, and Chandigarh.
Vasant Kunj, South Delhi
DLF Emporio
Known to be one of the most expensive malls in the country, the DLF Emporio is a name synonymous with luxury. The four-storeyed mall with a total retail area of 320,000 sq.
Vasant Kunj, South Delhi
Pacific Mall
Its convenient location and excellent connectivity, both by public and private transport, make Pacific Mall, Delhi a popular shopping destination in the city.
Tagore Garden, West Delhi
City Square
A premier shopping mall, the City Square, is one of the most prominent malls in West Delhi. From apparel stores to food outlets, you will find some of the best options in the mall.
Najafgarh Road, Shivaji Place, West Delhi
